Finishing the Aster Chart

Blog
  • Home
  • Projects
  • Blog
  • Github

Since my last post, I have finished the code to connect to the database, as well as the code to communicate between the server and the client. The current version of the project can be viewed here. As I am by no means an art guru, when designing my Aster chart, I searched online for what people rated to be “good” colors, and then used them in a random order to create my chart. After finishing the backbone of the code, I was waiting to here what my next step would be, so I decided to devote some time to colors. Origionally the selected section would turn a red orange color, and the points earned would also be that same color.
